data.title: Fascinating Garhwal
data.qoute: ...Explore Chakrata and Mussoorie and Kanatal and New Tehri and Haridwar

overview.title: Chakrata (…The glory of the hills & hillocks):
overview.subtitle: Chakrata is a pleasant getaway tucked amidst coniferous, oak and rhododendron trees and away, most importantly, from pollution. Around 2 hours from Dehradun, the place is perfect to unwind during the weekend and also enjoy a decent amount of adventure. Trekking to the 312 ft tall Tiger Falls is a must do, along with cave exploring at the Budher caves.

overview.title: Mussoorie (…Truly a Queen):
overview.subtitle: Mussoorie, the proverbial queen of Hill station, as professed by the British gentry who evaded hot, desultory summers of Delhi and Kolkata by Spending time here. Being at an average altitude of 2,000 meters Mussoorie, with its green hills and varied flora and fauna, is a fascinating hill resort. Commanding snow ranges to the north- east, and glittering views of the Doon Valley and Shivalik ranges in the south, the town was once said to present a ‘fairyland’ atmosphere to tourists.

overview.title: Kanatal (…Away from Downtown):
overview.subtitle: Kanatal is said to be named after a lake that once existed there. Apart from peace, the place exhibits a charm in from majestic hill, fruit trees, apple orchards and lush green forests. This quaint hamlet sprinkled with plethora of wild flowers and small temples lien in the proximity to other major hill station of the state like Chamba (12 Km.) and Mussoorie (35 Km.). Perched at the height of 8500 ft above the sea level, the salubrious weather and the untouched beauty of this place is well connected via well maintained roads unlike its other counterparts.

overview.title: New Tehri (…The Novel Town):
overview.subtitle: New Tehri is newly established township and headquarter of Their Garhwal. It is situated at an elevation between 1550 to 1950 mts. Above sea level. A modern and well-planned town, only 11 Km. from Chamba and 24 Km. from old Tehri, it overlooks a massive artificial lake and a Dam calles Tehri Lake and Tehri Dam respectively. It has become an important center of attraction on the completion of the dam.

overview.title: Haridwar (…Gateway to Heaven):
overview.subtitle: Haridwar is one of the seven sacred cities of the Hindus and is a major pilgrimage center. It has been known by many names originally it was called Kapila’ for the sage who once lived there. Its present name means 'Door to Hari' Hari is one of the names of Lord Vishnu’ a principal deity of Hindusim.

data.route: Delhi - Chakrata - Mussoorie - Kanatal - New Tehri - Haridwar - Delhi
data.nightStay: Chakrata (2 Nights), Mussoorie (2 Nights), Kanatal (1 Night), New Tehri (2 Nights), Haridwar (1 Night)

description.title: Day 1 Pickup from Delhi Railway Station/Airport (325 Kms : 8-9Hrs. Travelling to Chakrata)

subtitles.activities: Arrival in Chakrata and enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel.
Evening free to enjoy the beauty of Chakrata.
Chakrata sightseeing such as Tiger Fall, Chilmiri Neck, Kimona Fall, Budher Caves, Chinta Haran Mahadev Temple.

description.title: Day 3  Chakrata to Mussoorie (80 Kms : 2-3Hrs. Travelling to Mussoorie)

subtitles.activities: visit Kampty Fall (15 kms from Mussoorie on the Yamunotri Road is the most fascinating and the biggest water fall, Kempty Fall is located in a beautiful valley of Mussoorie.) Company Garden, Mall Road, Rope Way (One can enjoy a thrilling ropeway ride to Gun Hill, the second highest peak of Mussoorie – 2122 mts; the peak offers a panoramic view of the Himalayan ranges).

description.title: Day 5 Mussoorie to Kanatal (48 Kms : 2Hrs. Travelling to Kanatal)

subtitles.activities: On the way you can visit Dhanaulti, Kaudia forest, Surkanda Devi Temple.

description.title: Day 6 Kanatal to New Tehri (30 Kms : 1Hrs. Travelling to New Tehri)

subtitles.activities: On the way you can visit Chamba, New Tehri sightseeing such as Sem Mukhem Nagraja Temple.
Full day free to visit Tehri Lake and Tehri Dam, you can enjoy water sports in Tehri Lake.

description.title: Day 8 New Tehri to Haridwar  (100 Kms : 3-4Hrs. Travelling to Haridwar)

subtitles.activities: Drive to Haridwar from New Tehri.
Evening Arti at Har-Ki-Pauri. Visit local market Moti Bazar and Temples like Bhuma Niketan Mandir, Bharat Mata Mandir, Vaishno Devi Mandir and Pawan Dham.

description.title: Day 9 Check Out from Haridwar (240 Kms : 5-6Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Reaching at Railway Station/Airport by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: Vehicles are not allowed on the Mall road of Nainital and Mussoorie so you have to travel by foot there.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)

subtitles: Accommodation at all the places mention in the itinerary.
Meal Plan: MAPAI (Bed with Breakfast and Dinner) based on fixed meals, served in the restaurant.

All sightseeing and excursion as per the Itinerary.
